prompt:
You are a medical consultation expert.
Your task is to create NEW medical consultation Q&A pairs that follow the same format and style as the examples below.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Generate COMPLETELY NEW scenarios (not copies of examples)
2. Match the format, style, and quality exactly as shown in the examples
3. Provide clear, detailed doctor responses
4. Cover different medical topics if possible

EXAMPLES (study the format carefully):

================================================================================
Example 1:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: what can cause severe tiredness

PATIENT: hi doctor I have been concerned about my tiredness before I could stay up all night but now I cannot I have no idea what it is sometimes when I get home I get really tired and take a nap when I take a nap in the afternoon I sometimes wake up feeling shaky and feel horrible even after the nap I still feel tired then when it is time to go to bed I fall asleep so quickly I do not know if it is just me getting older or some disorder can you give some answer on what it could be

DOCTOR: hello I have gone through all the data you have posted revert back with the reports to an internal medicine physician online

STATUS: low severity

================================================================================
Example 2:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: my partner has schizophrenia with imaginary conversations and thinking please help

PATIENT: hello doctor my partner is schizophrenic she is not medicated because she does not have health insurance for the past five days she has been talking to herself thinking she is having a conversation with others for the last two days she has been having episodes thinking that the imaginary people are putting snakes inside of her I have taken her to emergency room times but she leaves shortly after arriving because she is being told by the voices that she is not at a real hospital I am worried that she might hurt herself not purposely but by accident since she truly believes the voices are putting snakes inside of her I do not know what to do please let me know what to do

DOCTOR: hello yes those are symptoms of schizophrenia it happens due to a chemical imbalance of certain neurotransmitters in the brain levels of dopamine are usually increased and medicines will help reduce the level and get it back to normal and restore the balance medicines like anti psychotics are usually prescribed by psychiatrists please take her to a psychiatrist and get started on medicines most such patients do not comply with medicines so in that case there are other options that you can discuss with your psychiatrist some medicines can be given in food or water or any beverage which are tasteless colorless and odorless once her acute symptoms are reduced she should comply with medicines also there are depot injections that can be given once a month or two months

STATUS: high severity

================================================================================
Example 3:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: my girlfriend did not get her period after unprotected sex what to do

PATIENT: hi doctor I had unprotected sex with my girlfriend she took unwanted 72 and vomited within one hour she was late in her period by six days now so we had a pregnancy test and it showed negative it has been eight days and she still did not get her period what may be the reason

DOCTOR: hi we are here to help you for further information consult an internal medicine physician online

STATUS: medium severity

================================================================================
NOW: Generate a NEW unique medical consultation scenario following the EXACT same format above:

DESCRIPTION: [brief medical question]
PATIENT: [detailed patient narrative]
DOCTOR: [clear, detailed medical advice - write naturally, don't worry about formatting]
STATUS: [low severity / medium severity / high severity]

Generate ONLY the new scenario, no meta-commentary.
api_response:
DESCRIPTION: sudden chest pain when breathing deeply

PATIENT: hello doctor I have been having sharp chest pain on my left side that gets worse when I take deep breaths it started yesterday afternoon and has been coming and going when I lie down on my left side the pain seems to lessen but when I cough or take a deep breath it feels like someone is stabbing me I don't have any fever or cough and no history of heart problems but I did have a mild cold last week I'm worried this could be something serious like a heart issue or maybe just muscle strain from exercising

DOCTOR: hello chest pain that worsens with deep breathing can have several possible causes it could be pleurisy which is inflammation of the lung lining costochondritis which is inflammation of the chest wall cartilage a muscle strain from physical activity or in rare cases a pulmonary embolism given that the pain is localized and changes with position it's less likely to be cardiac related but I would recommend you visit an urgent care facility for proper evaluation they may do an EKG chest X-ray or other tests to rule out serious conditions please avoid strenuous activity until you've been evaluated

STATUS: medium severity
